hero.desc: Kokode wa, gakusei pōtaru no shiyō hōhō o dankai-teki ni setsumei shimasu.
hero.banner: Seito-tachi o akarui mirai ni mukete shien shimasu. Seito-tachi o akarui mirai ni mukete shien shimasu. Akarui mirai ni mukete gakusei-tachi ni chikara o ataeru

faq.subheading: Tōsha ni tsuite shiritai koto wa subete shitsumon shite kudasai
faq.q1: Q. SELC karejji wa, Designated ran'ningu Intuition (DLI)desu ka? Daigaku no DLI bangō wa nanidesu ka.
faq.ans1: Hai, SELC karejji wa shitei gakushū kikandeari, karejji no DLI bangō wa
faq.q2: Q. SELC karejji e no orientēshon wa arimasu ka?
faq.ans2: Hai, orientēshon wa gakusei ni daigaku o hakken shi, kyanpasu o shiri, kanri tantōsha to kōryū shi, hitsuyōniōjite shien ga uke rareru risōsu o kakunin suru kikai o teikyō shimasu. Orientēshon no omona mokuteki wa, gakusei no tame no watashitachi no kenrōna gakushū kankyō to sapōtoshisutemu o kyōchō suru kotodesu. Hoka no kōsu ni tōroku suru ni wa shūryō ga hissu jōkendearu tame, shin'nyūsei orientēshon e no shusseki wa subete no shin'nyūsei ni gimudzuke rarete iru koto ni chūi shite kudasai.
faq.q3: Q.Does SELC college offer any accommodation assistance to its students?
faq.q4: Q. SELC wa gakusei ni shōgakkin, hōshō-kin, josei-kin o teikyō shite imasu ka?
faq.ans4: Hai. Kokunai gakusei to ryūgakusei no ryōhō ga riyō dekiru, samazamana shōgakkin,-shō, hojokin o teikyō shite imasu. Shikaku yōken oyobi gaidorain to tomoni hōkatsu-tekina risuto ni akusesu suru ni wa, risōsu o sanshō shite kudasai.
faq.q5: Q. Gakusei wa dono yōna kōtsū shudan o riyō dekimasu ka?
faq.ans5: SELC karejji wa bankūbā no dauntaun chūshin-bu no ichi-tōchi ni ari, basu ya sukaitorein no eki nado shinai no kōhan'na kōkyō kōtsūkikan e no akusesu ga benridesu. Kono chūshin-tekina ichi ni yori, gakusei wa daigaku e no ōfuku ga kantan katsu kōritsu-teki ni sentaku dekiru yō ni nari, shinai no samazamana basho kara ryokō suru gakusei ni totte hijō ni akusesu shi yasuku narimashita.
faq.q6: Q. Gakusei wa daigaku ni kayoinagara hataraku shikaku wa arimasu ka?
faq.ans6: Kanada de benkyō suru ryūgakusei wa, sukunakutomo 6-kagetsu tsudzuku furutaimu puroguramu ni tōroku shite iru baai, shū ni saidai 20-jikan hataraku koto ga dekimasu. Shōsai ni tsuite wa, ika o goran kudasai.
faq.q7: Q. Daigaku wa gakusei ni kyaria ni kansuru adobaisu ya sapōto o teikyō shite imasu ka?
faq.ans7: Hai, watashitachi no seikyō bumon wa gakusei ga shūshoku ichiba ni mukete junbi o totonoeru tame no shien o teikyō shite imasu.

contact.name: Furunēmu
contact.depart: Renrakusen no bumon o sentaku shite kudasai
contact.para: Rikuesuto no shori ni wa saidai 24-jikan kakaru baai ga arimasunode, go ryōshō kudasai. Omachi itadaite arigatōgozaimasu!
